The expert: s verdict concludes that Pelosi's statement is "ridiculously wrong" and rates it as "Pants on Fire!" This indicates that the claim made by Pelosi is highly inaccurate and misleading.
The fact: checking process involved researching and confirming the voting records of Russia and China on sanctions against Iran. It was found that both countries have, in fact, endorsed sanctions against Iran at least eight times before the 2015 nuclear deal. The evidence includes Security Council resolutions and voting records dating back to July 2006.
